entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Parent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
